headlines.description: — Mason Mount and Kepa Arrizabalaga were Chelsea’s stars as they helped to maintain Graham Potter’s unbeaten start in the Premier League with a 2-0 win over Aston Villa on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mount, Kepa stand out as Chelsea beats Villa 2-0 in EPL

headlines.description: Arsenal edged a tight affair with a 1-0 win against Leeds United at Elland Road to remain at the top of the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: VAR drama as Saka helps Arsenal edge Leeds

headlines.description: Manchester United were held to a frustrating goalless draw against Newcastle United at Old Trafford on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo sees 2 goals ruled out in Man Utd draw

headlines.description: — Declan Rice denied Ralph Hasenhuttl a vital win as West Ham drew 1-1 at Southampton in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rice earns West Ham 1-1 draw at Southampton

headlines.description: — Pep Guardiola says coins were thrown at him during Manchester City's 1-0 defeat at Liverpool in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Guardiola says Liverpool fans threw coins at him
